Name: Rogue Sweeper
About the game: RogueSweeper, as the name suggests, is a stage-based exploration puzzle game that combines the classic Minesweeper experience with some Rogue-lite elements. As you explore the dungeons, you will find a variety of materials ranging from empty cans to bones. This materials will allow you to craft tools that will aid you in your quest. Use the tools and your wit to conquer all 10 dungeons! What makes this game special? 【Fun combination of Minesweeper and Rogue-lite】 Numbers on the floor represent the amount of dynamite blocks present within the surrounding blocks. Use this information to determine where the dynamite blocks are located. Some dungeons may be hard to solve, and some might be so dark you won’t be able to see past a few blocks. But the challenge will just make the reward that much better! Use all the tools to your advantage, rely solely on your wits, or gamble your life on a mad rush! All methods are valid in your quest for treasure. 【Exploration tools】 Make good use of the materials you find during your exploration by crafting helpful tools that will aid you in your quest! Dynamite detector Check the terrain for hidden dynamite with this device. Bomb pouch Bring your own explosives and safely blow up the surrounding area! Compass A mysterious compass that points towards treasure.
